weekOf: February 26th to March 5th (Not live until ~5am EDT on February 26th)
introMessages: Drift to victory in the surprisingly powerful new Shitzu Keitora — now available from Southern San Andreas Super Autos and eligible for Drift Tuning alongside three existing vehicles.

During this week's Drift Event in GTA Online earn triple on Drift Races, 5X LS Car Meet Rep, get the Manga Classic livery for the Drift variant of the Annis Euros, a claimable Salvage Yard Robbery vehicle, and much more.

There’s also GTA$500,000 in Twitch Drops available to claim by watching a special Community Series featuring top racing tracks from Japanese creators — look out for more info on that tomorrow and check out the rest of this week's details below.
prizeRideChallenge: Place Top 3 in the LS Car Meet Series for 4 days in a row
hswTimeTrial: Terminal to Chiliad Mountain State Wilderness

salvageYardRobberies.vehicle: Maibatsu Penumbra FF with LS Car Meet Vanity Plate CLAIMABLE

weeklyChallenge: Participate in 3 Drift Races to earn the Bright Manor Racing Suit and GTA$100,000
bonuses: 4X GTA$ and RP - Exotic Exports )(10 Cars From the Auto Shop List)
3X GTA$ and RP - Drift Races (6X for GTA+ Members)
2X GTA$ - Weed Sell Missions (Biker Weed Farms and Nightclub Organic Produce)
